### Mntl.Deferred.init($container)
__Arguments__
- __$container__ _(jQery object)_ The parent element of the video player
__Returns__ `undefined`
### Mntl.Deferred.RequestContext(componentIds, [urlOverload|null], [skipGenerify|false], [htmlCallback|null], [isPageview|false])
Makes componentIds int an object.
__Arguments__
- __componentIds__ `object|string|array`
- __urlOverload__
- __skipGenerify__
- __htmlCallback__
- __isPageview__
__Returns__ `object`
### Mntl.Deferred.requestComponents(context)
Posts form data and handle success.
__Arguments__
- __context__ `object` RequestContext
__Returns__ `object`
### Mntl.Deferred.addToBatch(component)
Adds supplied component to `batchTimer.components`;
__Arguments__
- __component__ `string|array`
__ Returns__ `undefined`
### Mntl.Deferred.setBtfVals
Sets `component.pos` = `offset().top` for each element in the btf array.
__Returns__ `undefined`
### Mntl.Deferred.DEFAULTS[object]
- __jqSel:__ `'[data-defer]'`
- __requestUrl:__ window.location.href
### Mntl.Deferred.removeEventListener(context, event, component, fn)
Executes `jQuery.off` on supplied context. [See documentation](http://api.jquery.com/off/).
